alert.note: Alert for Coahoma (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Coahoma County through 545 PM CDT... At 514 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sherard, or near Clarksdale, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clarksdale, Friars Point, Kings, Sherard, Lyon, Rena Lara, Hopson, Bobo, Green Grove, Beverly, Clover Hill, Lurand and Farrell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
